content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 FIRST_ROW = 2,
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'container1_ananddatalakestorage111_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [container1_ananddatalakestorage111_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://container1@ananddatalakestorage111.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE emp (
	[empId] nvarchar(4000),
	[empName] nvarchar(4000),
	[gender] nvarchar(4000),
	[deptid] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Source/Employee.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [container1_ananddatalakestorage111_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT * FROM dbo.emp
